name: The Sims 4: Dream Home Decorator
storyline:
Turn your client’s fantasy into reality in the Dream Home Decorator game pack. Every home is full of unrealized potential, and only you can take it from drab to fab.

Meet your clients, get to know them, and renovate a space they'll love on their budget. The right design can change lives.

Each job needs to consider a client’s taste, needs and budget. You’ll need to tailor your designs with all of this in mind if you want a glowing recommendation.

Replace curtains or replace the whole kitchen. There’s no change too big when it comes to building the ideal home.

Show off your finished makeover with Before and After comparisons. Hopefully, your work inspires happy crying instead of tears of disappointment.
summary: Turn your client's fantasy into reality with The Sims 4: Dream Home Decorator. Every home is full of unrealized potential, and only you can take it from drab to fab. If you want to build your professional reputation, get to know every Sims' Likes and Dislikes before you start designing, then deliver the perfect renovation for each client. Once you've worked your magic, get ready to see the astonished look on your client's face with the big reveal!
